channel.title: Need Help With My Client! REP++
channel.description:
Hello,
I need help with my client cause when i add models i get this
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/X1RusherX1/ClientProblem.png[/img]
and need help with my shops cause when i try to make it infinity i get this
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/X1RusherX1/Naamloos5.png[/img]
but i want this icon
[IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/6602/shopm.png[/img]
How can i fix?
Thanks!

item.title: Need Help With My Client! REP++
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

i also have the same problem as the 1st one i will post when i get the solution (: and for the 2nd one you must go into shops.cfg and change the 0 to a number (ex. 13664 0 13665 0 13666 0)
^ ^
item id number in shop

change the number in shop and that many will be in the shop, and it auto stocks 2 so no need to change that(:

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Client! REP++
